entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 8.
